title: Contagion
plotSummary: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a pandemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plotSummary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

title: The Hunger Games
plotSummary: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

title: Independence Day
plotSummary: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth, but a group of courageous humans led by the U.S. President and a scientist fight back against the invaders.

title: Titanic
plotSummary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Matrix
plotSummary: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines, and joins a rebellion to break free.

title: World War Z
plotSummary: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop a zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatens to destroy humanity itself.

title: Waterworld
plotSummary: In a future where the polar ice caps have melted and most of Earth is underwater, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw 'smokers,' and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

title: Children of Men
plotSummary: In a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

title: Snowpiercer
plotSummary: In a future where a failed climate-change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, a new class system emerges.

title: The Lost Missile
plotSummary: A mysterious missile threatens to destroy Earth as scientists race to stop it.

title: Teenage Caveman
plotSummary: A young caveman challenges his tribe's superstitions in a world that may be post-apocalyptic.

title: On the Beach
plotSummary: Survivors in Australia await the arrival of deadly radiation following a nuclear war.

title: The World, the Flesh and the Devil
plotSummary: Three survivors of a global catastrophe struggle with their relationships and prejudices.

title: Beyond the Time Barrier
plotSummary: A pilot travels to a dystopian future where humanity faces extinction from a deadly plague.

title: Last Woman on Earth
plotSummary: Three survivors of a mysterious catastrophe that wiped out the world's population struggle with their new reality.

title: Battle of the Worlds
plotSummary: A rogue planet threatens Earth, and scientists must find a way to save humanity.

title: The Last War
plotSummary: A Japanese film depicting the potential devastation of a global nuclear war.

title: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
plotSummary: Nuclear tests knock Earth off its axis, causing global climate changes that threaten all life.

title: The Creation of the Humanoids
plotSummary: In a post-nuclear world, humans create humanoid robots, leading to conflicts between the two groups.

title: Panic in year Zero!
plotSummary: A family tries to survive in the aftermath of a nuclear attack on Los Angeles.

title: The Day of the Triffids
plotSummary: A remake of the 1962 film where most of humanity is blinded leaving them vulnerable to carnivorous plants.

title: This Is Not a Test
plotSummary: A group of people at a roadblock face the possibility of imminent nuclear war.

title: La Jetée
plotSummary: A man is sent back in time to save the future in this influential experimental short film.

title: Ladybug Ladybug
plotSummary: A school receives a nuclear attack warning, and teachers must decide how to protect their students.
